p: A standardized form for clinical data collection was designed. The data were mainly retrieved from the hospitalâ€™s electronic medical records and were supplemented by a secondary manual search. The following data were collected: demographic characteristics, underlying medical conditions, clinical signs and symptoms, antiviral treatment course (oseltamivir or peramivir therapy), results of laboratory tests and radiography findings at the time of presentation and during the entire clinical course, in-hospital complications, and fatality.
